scripts.keygen: openssl req -nodes -new -x509 -keyout server.key -out server.crt -subj "/CN=example.com/O=/C=US" || echo 'OpenSSL not found, install it manually'
scripts.builddb: npx rimraf issuerreg.db && sqlite3 issuerreg.db < schema.sql
scripts.localtestdata: sqlite3 issuerreg.db "PRAGMA foreign_keys = OFF; BEGIN TRANSACTION; SELECT 'DELETE FROM ' || name || ';' FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table';" | sqlite3 issuerreg.db && sqlite3 issuerreg.db "PRAGMA foreign_keys = ON;" && sqlite3 issuerreg.db < testdata.sql
